Package main.java.org.tinyradius.test

This package contains sample applications that show how to use TinyRadius.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
TestClient Simple Radius command-line client.
TestDictionary Shows how to use TinyRadius with a custom dictionary loaded from a dictionary file.
TestProxy Test proxy server.
TestServer Test server which terminates after 30 s.
 

Package main.java.org.tinyradius.test Description

This package contains sample applications that show how to use TinyRadius.

  • TestClient shows how to send Radius Access-Request and Accounting-Request packets.
  • TestServer can answer both to Access-Request and Access-Response packets with Access-Accept/Reject or Accounting-Response, respectively.
  • TestProxy shows how to implement a proxy radius server. You can use this class together with TestClient and TestServer.
  • TestDictionary demonstrates the use of custom dictionaries.
